tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** *** **** *** *** *** **** We moved to different part of banglore and had to search for a new Dr for my 2 pregnancy.After listening to lot of positive reviews from our friend circle we consulted Dr Anita .I had spotting issues. For my first time i was on complete bed rest and had to take weekly injectionsr.I ws expecting a similar treatment which was suggested by other Drs but to my surprise Dr was completely confident about following regular activities. Explained to me all the details with patience . Best thing is she never scares you . You will be feeling safe with her at each stage of pregnancy. Shes well aware with all the latest updates. par with all the health advices received from foreign professionals.  I strongly recommend Dr Anita. Each pregnant lady deserves a Dr like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We opted Rainbow hospital ,because of Dr.Anitha Rao. She is very professional and experienced.I would definitely recommend her.One of the best gynaecologist . She is very patient in answering your questions and she made my entire journey very smooth, The entire team is very supportive, my queries were answered offline as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is a blessing for us. We are blessed with beautiful baby girl. After ttc for 7 years with one ectopic and another  dnc ..my friend recommended Dr Anita Rao . I highly recommend her. Excellent pre-post pregnant care. She is very positive and makes us feel safe. I had normal delivery as I followed her instruction strictly. Ladies close your eyes and visit her for any gynec related issues. Thank you Dr.
